title: A Few Good Men (Harlequin Blaze #445)
description: Corporal Eric Armstrong is finally going to meet his sexy new pen pal in the flesh. Only, Eric already knows her...very, very well!Corporal Eddie Cash has a reputation for living on the edge. Still, even he's worried about his next adventure--fatherhood.Lieutenant Matt Guerrero has always been proud to serve his country. Only, this time it might cost him his marriage....Captain Brian Justice loves being a Marine, almost as much as he's starting to love Angela Mitchell. Too bad he's about to lose them both....
author: Tori Carrington
